description: Command an army, in the sequel to the hit turn based strategy game Wargroove!

wargroove2-1.1.1.description:
# New Features:
- Adds the ability to adjust the cost of units from production structures based on:
  - The level's sphere
  - The distance from the center (Note that Northern levels are closer, then East, then South and West is further)
  - Random values
- The AI can also have their unit costs adjusted as well as the player's
- Cost multipliers range from 0.5-1.5
- Each production structure (Barracks, Tower, Hideout, Port) can be adjusted individually
- Use the /toggle_costs command in the client to set the costs to vanilla and back. Useful in case a level becomes impossible
- This adds an insane 48 extra options, by default they are all set to 100 (aka vanilla behavior)

# Bugfixes:
- Fixes a rare generation error based on a race condition
- Fixes the WG2 mod so that it references "ai_tower_cost" not "ai_tower_cost " thus preventing a crash
wargroove2-1.1.1.title: Wargroove 2 - 1.1.1 Dynamic Unit Costs

wargroove2-1.1.2.description:
# New Features:
- Adds the ability to adjust the cost of units from production structures based on:
  - The level's sphere
  - The distance from the center (Note that Northern levels are closer, then East, then South and West is further)
  - Random values
- The AI can also have their unit costs adjusted as well as the player's
- Cost multipliers range from 0.5-1.5
- Each production structure (Barracks, Tower, Hideout, Port) can be adjusted individually
- Use the /toggle_costs command in the client to set the costs to vanilla and back. Useful in case a level becomes impossible
- This adds an insane 48 extra options, by default they are all set to 100 (aka vanilla behavior)
- Income Boosts now fill 1 to 2 with Groove Boosts

# Bugfixes:
- Fixes a rare generation error based on a race condition
- Fixes the WG2 mod so that it references "ai_tower_cost" not "ai_tower_cost " thus preventing a crash
wargroove2-1.1.2.title: Wargroove 2 - 1.1.2 Dynamic Unit Costs

wargroove2-1.1.3.description:
# New Features:
- Adds the ability to adjust the cost of units from production structures based on:
  - The level's sphere
  - The distance from the center (Note that Northern levels are closer, then East, then South and West is further)
  - Random values
- The AI can also have their unit costs adjusted as well as the player's
- Cost multipliers range from 0.5-1.5
- Each production structure (Barracks, Tower, Hideout, Port) can be adjusted individually
- Use the /toggle_costs command in the client to set the costs to vanilla and back. Useful in case a level becomes impossible
- This adds an insane 48 extra options, by default they are all set to 100 (aka vanilla behavior)
- Income Boosts now fill 1 to 2 with Groove Boosts

# Bugfixes:
- Fixes a rare generation error based on a race condition
- Fixes the WG2 mod so that it references "ai_tower_cost" not "ai_tower_cost " thus preventing a crash
- Added option validation. The generator will throw an error if there are too few levels available to satisfy the number of items.
wargroove2-1.1.3.title: Wargroove 2 - 1.1.3 Dynamic Unit Costs

wargroove2-1.1.4.description:
# New Features:
- Adds the ability to adjust the cost of units from production structures based on:

# Bugfixes:
- Fixes a rare generation error based on a race condition
- Fixes the WG2 mod so that it references "ai_tower_cost" not "ai_tower_cost " thus preventing a crash

- Various AP-Index related fixes.
